backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Structured report mapping implemented Valentine features to source files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files and their roles in the Valentine app.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind variables and dark-mode theme tokens for general app styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main interactive Valentine UI with evasive No button behavior and meme reveal on Yes click.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook for creating and refreshing a backend actor tied to Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Full Internet Identity context provider and hook handling login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder module indicating no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/index.css: Romantic pink-themed Tailwind variables plus fade and float animations for the Valentine UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point setting up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS config enabling dark mode, plugin integrations, custom color palette, animations, and extended theme settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the Valentine web appâ€™s features, requirements, state version, and pending feature requests.
